overview: Felipe is a young entrepreneur who has lived in 4 different countries and is fluent in Spanish and English. His drive towards innovation drove him to the heart of Silicon Valley: Stanford University, where he is now majoring in Computer Science. Up to now, Felipe has worked on a project with two other Stanford CS students which has led to the creation of Salsa Incorporated, a social networking company that focuses its efforts in becoming the core link in social entities, acting as a dynamic social platform that embraces seamless communication and idea generation.
